Package unitTests.mainframe

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackupStub
    a Backup stub allows use to use store and restore as we would expect from the class also defines methods that set a specific list - instead of 'storeState' that requests them all
    BackupStubFactory
    this stub factory returns the same object - and we can make it return a brand new object by invoking restart()
    MainframeUnitTest
    unit test for the mainframe we must note that we have a regular way to see if the mainframe is aware of some action: we do shutDown and check the backup XML file that the mainframe does of its voters list, parties list and unregistered voters list - if the expected changes are not seen then it is a failure - this is the only way to check the mainframe
    MainframeWindowStub
    the only actual use of this stub is the method 'showHistogram' that with its help we check whether the Mainframe sends the right list to the mentioned method we use the method
    MainframeWindowStubFactory
    this stub factory returns the same object - and we can make it return a brand new object by invoking restart()
    ReadSuppliedXMLStub
    this is the stub of the class ReadSuppliedXML this stub allows us set the lists that the methods of ReadSuppliedXML will return
    ReadSuppliedXMLStubFactory
    this stub factory returns the same object - and we can make it return a brand new object by invoking restart()
    StationsControllerStub
    in the testing, we only use the methods 'initialize', 'markVoted', 'checkParties' and 'hotBackup' of this stub when we use markVoted we mark that the voter voted to a specific party, in our case - 'oui' 'checkParties' returns true as it will be in the real running of this class
    StationsControllerStubFactory
    this stub factory returns the same object - and we can make it return a brand new object by invoking restart()
    VotingStationFactoryStub
    this stub factory returns the same object - and we can make it return a brand new object by invoking restart()
    VotingStationStub
    this stub is here only because without it the Mainframe wont work we do not bother to implement any behavior for this stub
